title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

title.en: Reincarnated as the Lazy and Villainous Noble, I Broke the Scenario and Became the Most Formidable With Extraordinary Magic

altTitles.ja-ro: Taidana Akuhazukashime Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikaku Gai No Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation.

I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs!

Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!
description.ja:
大好きな学園ゲームに登場する悪役貴族・ヴァイスに転生してしまった、やがてこの身に待ち受けるのは、救いなしの最悪な破滅エンド。

それだけはなんとしてでも回避したい！

だったらこのゲームの主人公すら遠く及ばない、圧倒的な力を身につけて最強になるしかない！

最凶成り上がり異世界学園ファンタジーコミカライズ!

title.en: The Red Nights at the Duke's Castle

description.en:
From Tappytoon Official English Translations: 
When Sorel Idris turns around to find a stranger in her home, she isn’t that surprised at first. After all, her father warned her this would happen. But when she detects the faint scent of blood in the air, she can’t keep her rabbit ears from popping out in shock. Her father failed to mention that her soon-to-be husband, Duke James Calier, was a vampire centuries older than her! On top of that, she discovers she’s the heiress to a considerable fortune. Sorel slowly adjusts to her newlywed life while attending the university of her dreams.

title.en: The Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke

altTitles.en: She Is the Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke
The Real Youngest Daughter of the Villainous Duke

altTitles.ja: 過保護な悪党公爵家で奮闘中です!

altTitles.zh: 反派家族的掌权小女儿

description.en:
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---

description.id:
Ketika saya masih seorang siswa sekolah menengah, saya sangat terpesona oleh novel itu sehingga saya berhenti menulis. Dan sekarang saya merasuki tubuh karakter pendukung, bukan karakter utama. Itu adalah gadis yatim piatu berusia 7 tahun tanpa nama... Harus menderita melemahkan orang lain, sampai saya benar-benar lelah dan lari dari tempat itu. Tapi saya ditangkap dan dijual sebagai budak. Saya pikir hidup saya sudah berakhir ...Tetapi orang yang menyelamatkan saya adalah penjahat paling menonjol dalam novel, Henriette. Dia memperlakukan kaisar seperti boneka. Seseorang yang memiliki reputasi sangat kejam dalam aslinya dan memiliki hobi memotong tenggorokan bangsawan. …Apakah itu ayah biologisku? Tapi selain reputasi buruk itu, tinggal bersamanya juga tidak buruk. “Baiklah, sayangku” “Kamu bisa melakukan apapun yang kamu mau. Jika Anda menginginkan sesuatu, semua orang di keluarga akan melakukan apa yang Anda inginkan.” Tunggu… Aku tidak menulis novel seperti itu sejak awal?

---

description.pt-br:
Eu possuía um personagem em um romance que parei de escrever por hobby quando estava no ensino médio. Minha mãe morreu em um acidente, e dizem que meu pai morreu logo depois de ir para a cadeia. Graças a isso, fiquei órfã aos sete anos sem nome. Enquanto morava na casa de outra pessoa, estava exausto de trabalhar e fui pego fugindo. Em seguida, vendido para s * salvar comerciantes. Eu queria saber se esta vida foi feita para ser arruinada. O respeitável Duque, o maior vilão do Império, comprou-me. "Ela tem 7 anos, mas era pequena e muito magra." Henriette, a pior vilã do original, cujo hobby é fazer todo mundo agir como uma marionete, pregar peças na família imperial e ameaçar o pescoço da aristocracia, descobriu-se que aquele homem assustador é meu verdadeiro pai que foi preso! Mas você parece um pouco diferente do vilão original. "Bem, duque..." "Não." “…Oh, pai?” "Isso também." "...uh, papai?" “Sim, minha filha. O que você quer ter hoje? Henriette, que eu achava assustadora, é mais amigável do que eu pensava. “Se alguém te incomodar de agora em diante, você tem que contar pro seu irmão mais velho, ok? Vou afogá-los no fundo do lago.” “Devo ver flores com minha irmãzinha hoje? Há tantas sereias ornamentais na estufa de vidro. Achei que você iria gostar, então peguei eu mesmo. Fiz um bom trabalho? “Essa garota lenta! Papai te ligou... Não eu não sou doido! Droga, não seja idiota! Ahhh! Sim! Estou errado! OK?" Os novos irmãos eram definitivamente vilões no original, mas são muito mais legais do que eu pensava. "Tu podes fazer o que quiseres. Qualquer pessoa da família, se você disser, ouvirá com atenção e fará o que você disser”. Mas é estranho. O romance que escrevi não era originalmente assim. “…Se você me prometer algumas coisas, eu ficarei com você de novo. Eu não vou deixar você. “Você pode me ver a qualquer hora sem hora marcada.” "Eu devo? Eu sempre posso fugir para um lugar onde você nunca mais me encontrará. Ele franziu as sobrancelhas. Se eu soubesse que uma pequena palavra de expressão teria causado uma reação tão terrível, eu teria ficado de boca fechada. Foi quando eu estava no meio do arrependimento, "Você está enganado. Você acha que eu vou deixar você ir em primeiro lugar, isso não deveria ser possível primeiro? "…That?" "Quem disse que eu deixaria você fugir?" …Não importa o quanto eu pense sobre isso, acho que entendi errado. "Se você realmente fugir, você não deve ser pego por mim novamente."

---

description.en:
Emilone was a well-known actress before she got transported to another world and became a saint.  
She got a plausible name of 'the Holy Lady Who Moved Dimensions', but she didn't receive any attention. This happened because all the Empire's attention was on Princess Ronella.  
As a result, Emilone, who was devoted to her work as a saint, accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Ronella. The innocent and kind facades of the princess were all acting!  
This can be pretty fun. Wouldn't I be able to break my boring routine when I got closer to Princess Ronella?  
Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

altTitles.ja: 忘却バッテリー

description.en:
Two junior school baseball geniuses who have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. 

Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia! The talented pair were hard to defeat in junior high, and they crushed other players' dreams. 

They both enroll in the no-name Kotesashi High School in Tokyo, where they encounter other baseball players who had quit after losing to the two boys!

Their high school baseball story begins again!
description.ja:
中学球界で名を馳せるも野球から遠ざかっていた天才たちが都立の野球無名高校で偶然集結。

完全無欠の剛腕投手・清峰葉流火（きよみねはるか）。その相方（バッテリー）、切れ者捕手の“智将”要圭（記憶喪失により現在、素人！）。そして、かつて2人に敗れ散った者たち…

巡り合い、再び動き出す彼らの高校野球ストーリーがいま始まる!

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

description.de: Von ihrem eigenen Verlobten zu Tode vergiftet werden?! Eunha ist nicht in die Geschichte eines Romans aufgewacht, nur um als ein unglückliches Extra wieder getötet zu werden. Um ihre Geschichte zu ändern, braucht sie eine Deckung...sechs Monate lang vorgeben, die Verlobte des männlichen Hauptcharakteren des Romans, Herzog Noah Wynknight, zu sein. Aber wird dieser kaltherzige, engelsgesichtige Dämon eines Mannes ihr wirklich helfen, ihr unglückliches Ende zu vermeiden?!
description.en: Poisoned to death by her own betrothed?! Eunha didn’t wake up in a novel’s story just to get killed off again as an unfortunate extra! To change her story she needs a cover… 6 months pretending to be the fake fiancée of the novel's male protagonist, Duke Noah Wynknight. But will this cold-hearted, angel-faced demon of a man really help her avoid another ill-fated ending?!
description.es: ¿Envenenada hasta la muerte por su propio prometido? ¡Eunha no se despertó en la historia de una novela para ser asesinada de nuevo como un personaje secundario más! Para cambiar su historia, ella necesita fingir 6 meses ser la novia falsa del protagonista masculino de la novela, el Duque Noah Wynknight. ¡¿Pero este demonio de un hombre de corazón frío y rostro de ángel realmente la ayudará a evitar otro final desafortunado?!
description.fr: Empoisonnée par son propre fiancé?! Eunha ne s’est pas réveillée dans l’histoire d’un roman pour se faire tuer! Pour changer son histoire, elle a besoin d'une couverture… six mois à prétendre être la fausse fiancée du personnage principal du roman, le Duc Noah Wynknight. Mais ce démon d'un homme au cœur froid et au visage d'ange l'aidera-t-il vraiment à éviter une autre fin malheureuse?!
description.hr: Otrovana od strane svog vlastitog zaručnika?! Eunha se nije probudila u romanu samo da bi završila ubijena kao nesretni višak! Da promijeni svoju priču, treba joj zaštita...6 mjeseci pretvaranja da je zaručnica glavnog muškog lika u romanu, zvanog vojvoda Noah Wynknight. Ali hoće li joj taj demon od čovjeka s kamenim srcem i licem anđela stvarno pomoći da izbjegne još jedan tragičan završetak
description.hu: Amikor Park EunHa meghal a modern kori Koreában, Raeliana McMillan, egy nouveau riche báró lányának a testében tér magához. Azonban ez nem egy hétköznapi világ - pontosan olyan, mint a regényben lévő, amit olvasott. Családja szereti, mintha egy tündérmesében lenne. De Raeliana messze áll a főszereplőtől - ő csak egy cselekményeszköz, akinek a vőlegénye általi meggyilkolása kezdeményezi a történetet. Raeliana nem szándékozik csendben elviselni sorsát. A szemét olyasvalakire szegezi, aki nagy hatalmi pozícióban van - a vieux riche férfi főszereplőjére, Noah Volstaire Wynknight hercegre. Célja, hogy megváltoztassa az eredeti történetet. A jövőbeni események ismereteit felhasználva Raeliana információt nyújt Noah-nak azzal a feltétellel, hogy eljátssza a hamis vőlegényét, de a kétszínű herceg keresztül húzza a számításait!
description.ru:
После неожиданной гибели Пак Ын Ха попадает в волшебный мир, где всё идёт по знакомому ей сюжету романа. Однако она - не главная героиня этой истории, ей досталась второстепенная роль со скорым трагичным концом! Чтобы избежать своей незавидной судьбы, она заключает контракт с герцогом Ноа Волстео Виннайтом. Но всё не так просто… За добрым и ангельским лицом герцога скрывается настоящий дьявол! Сможет ли она избежать судьбы, некогда прописанной на страницах?  


---

- Updates every Monday in the Kakao Page  
  
Official: [Indonesian](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Tunangan-Kontrak-Duke/1999), [Chinese](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/2180/), [Vietnamese](https://comi.mobi/truyen/vi-hon-the-khe-uoc-cua-cong-tuoc/), [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/3673?etype=episode), [French](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/manoir-wynknight)

title.en: A Sinner of the Deep Sea

altTitles.ja: アビスアジュールの罪人

description.en: The ocean covers about 70 percent of the earth’s surface—a whole world, yet unknown to humanity…and in its depths a nation, thousands of meters beneath the waves. There, the mermaid Jo has been whiling away her days in peace. But that tranquility is shattered when her friend Ryuu is imprisoned for breaking the gravest of undersea laws: Their existence must be kept hidden from the people above. But why would Ryuu let the secret slip? And who did she tell? The curtain rises on Jo’s adventure to save her friend—and on a story of love…?!
description.pt-br: Por muitos séculos, Tritões e sereias tem vivido nas profundezas do oceano – 4.000 metros abaixo da superfície – onde a humanidade não pode encontrá-los. No entanto, a vida de uma sereia é virada de cabeça para baixo quando sua melhor amiga se apaixona por um humano.

altTitles.ja: 異世界失格

altTitles.en: No Longer Allowed in Another World

description.en:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers—sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?
___
Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human/Human Disqualification).
description.ru: После неудачного двойного самоубийства, наш главный герой переносится в другой мир. И чтобы не случилось, он обещает, что найдёт свою любовь и в этом мире, и опять покончит с собой.
description.uk: Як і у відомій книзі Осаму Дадзая "Бракована людина" / "Крах людини", головний герой цієї історії намагається вчинити подвійне самогубство зі своєю коханою... але замість цього його збиває вантажівка і він потрапляє в інший світ. Тепер він хоче знайти свою кохану, щоб знову покінчити життя самогубством разом з нею.
description.pt-br: Em 13 de junho de 1948, o autor Osamu Dazai estava prestes a se suicidar com Shizuko Ota mas foi convocado para outro mundo. Agora ele quer encontrar a reencarnação de sua amante, para que possa cometer suicídio com ela.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: Ake no Joi to Yoi no Majo ~Boku to Kanojo no Midara na Karute~

altTitles.ja: 明けの女医と宵の魔女～僕と彼女のみだらなカルテ～

altTitles.en: The Morning Doctor and the Evening Witch

description.en:
Kou is in search for a cure to his special illness.

He arrives at visits Hakone, a remote clinic. Despite the spacious clinic with a swimming pool and other facilities, a sole doctor named Babel lives there alone. She diagnoses that Kou's treatment requires contact with the seductive opposite sex.

This is the story of a daily medical examination between an innocent boy and a bewitching female doctor, which can never be told to others.
description.ja: 特別な病を治療する為、箱根を訪れた少年・コウ。彼が辿り着いたのは人里離れた診療所。プールなどが併設している広大な診療所にも拘わらず、そこには女医が一人で暮らしているという。彼女の名はバベル。女医は、コウの治療には魅惑的な異性との接触が必要と診断するが……。これは日々行われる、決して他人には言えないーー無垢な少年と妖艶な女医とのみだらな診療録。水曜日のシリウスにて毎月第1・第3火曜日、こっそりと診療開始。

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

altTitles.ja: コトダマ叶えて！ ときえ先生

altTitles.en: Through the Power of Words, Grant Me My Wishes, Tokie-sensei

description.en:
In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. 

From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

altTitles.vi: Toàn Cầu Băng Phong: Ta Chế Tạo Phòng An Toàn Tại Tận Thế
Trái Đất Đóng Băng: Tôi Gầy Dựng Nên Phòng An Toàn Thời Tận Thế
Sông Băng Tận Thế, Ta Trữ Hàng Chục Tỷ Vật Tư

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en:
My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. 

And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle.
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!
description.ja: 白崎純の隣の家には、神宮寺琉実と那織という双子の姉妹が住んでいる。ずっと仲の良い幼なじみでいられると思っていた。純が琉実に告白されるその時までは。そして、琉実が純を振ったその時からは―――。
description.pt-br: Minha família se mudou para a casa vizinha da família Jinguji quando eu tinha seis anos. Desde então, até eu estar na primeira série do ensino médio, ambos os pais se davam bem, e as irmãs gêmeas da família Jinguji com quem cresci eram minhas amigas íntimas, como se fossem minha própria família. Ryumi, a irmã que parece um menino, e Naori, a irmã otaku que é fofa por fora. E eu sou Jun Shirasaki, que não tem medo de ficar imprensada entre lindas irmãs com personalidades diferentes. Embora seja um novato apaixonado, não tenho um relacionamento especial e as mudanças continuam. "Por que você não sai comigo? Que tal tentarmos namorar?" Essas palavras de Ryumi eventualmente nos levaram a um estranho triângulo amoroso. A história da comédia romântica do primeiro amor com gêmeos começa!

description.en: Takuma Hirose is a young, male high school student, who is blind for unknown reasons. After his mother died an unexpected death, it left a deep emotional scar on him, which caused him to become very lonely and reserved. Due to this, Takuma and his father move from the city out into a rural area and Takuma is enrolled into a new high school. At his new school, he meets several new girls, three of whom he gets to know the most out of anyone else. They are, the firm and obstinate Hayami Kohinata, the kind and obliging Hinata Kagura, and the cheerful and mysterious Otoha. As Takuma interacts with these girls, his medical condition gradually begins to heal.

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード will+Dress D2

description.en: Mukae Jinki have gathered 15 Fighters, and One who have chosen from winning all the Shop Tournaments. These 16 fighters will fight for the throne to be the strongest, as the Curtain for the Second Deluxe Opens!! Who will be the one to Control the fight, who will be the one to win!?

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

altTitles.hu: Olyan Női Karakterként Kerülök Egy Másik Világba, Akinek Ugyan Vannak Különleges Képességei, De Mivel Egy Jelentéktelen Karakter Vagyok, Megpróbálok Nem Feltűnni És Békés Hétköznapi Életet Élni!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

description.en: For a very long time, the Baek family has been haunted by the legendary existence known as "Illishine." Hong Soorim, who has been imprisoned for ten years due to suspicions about this existence, finally shows a mark on his body upon turning twenty. The company that has been keeping her decides to strike a deal with both Chairman Baek and his son, Baek Wookyung. Wookyung offers a higher price than his father to meet Soorim. As Soorim accepts his fate, he tries to use Wookyung to his advantage. Despite their age difference, Wookyung finds himself drawn to Soorim...

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語
メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

altTitles.ja: ミズダコちゃんからは逃げられない！

description.en:
Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan), a demi-human girl, transfers to his school.
A cute, mysterious, and slightly scary story begins!

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is a Failure.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de classe por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.ja: 檻ノ中のソリスト
Soloist in a cage

description.ar: في سجن كبير جدا لدرجة تسميته بالمدينة، يتجمع شتى أنواع المجرمين. و بسبب جدرانه الغير قابلة للاختراق استمرت ساكنة السجن بالنمو. و بين كل هذا و ذاك شقيقان، فتاة صغيرة و طفل رضيع. ما هو مصيرهما يا ترى في هذه المدينة البائسة و الباردة؟ قصة من الأمل و النضال تبدأ الآن. ابدأ بقراءته مترجم على مانجا العرب
description.en:
In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city…? A story of hope and struggle begins.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)
description.fa: زندان‌شهر مکانی که بیش از پانصد هزار نفر زندانی را در خود جای داده است و امکان فرار از آن وجود ندارد، چرا که ساکنان آن به طور مداوم توسط هزاران نگهبان ربات تحت نظر هستند. «کلوئی» دختری هفت ساله، تمام عمرش را در این شهر دلخراش زندگی کرده است. او که توسط والدینش رها شده است، روزهای خود را با برادر کوچکش، «لوک» می‌گذراند. از آنجایی که خیابان‌ها مملو از جنایتکاران خطرناک است، او هرگز خانه را ترک نکرده و با مراقبت از برادرش هدف خود را در زندگی می یابد. یک شب، «کلوئی» پس از اینکه متوجه شد همسایگانش در حال تلاش برای فرار هستند، مخفیانه آنها را در حالی که «لوک» را حمل می‌کند، تعقیب می‌کند. در حین فرار همه چیز بهم می‌ریزد و او از برادرش جدا می شود ...
description.es-la: En una prisión tan grande que se llama ciudad, se han acumulado todo tipo de criminales. Debido a los ineludibles muros, la población no hace más que crecer. Dentro hay un par de hermanos: una niña y un niño recién nacido. ¿Cuál será su destino en esta desolada y fría ciudad? Comienza una historia de esperanza y lucha.

altTitles.ja: ほのスト！ ～豪炎寺のひとりごと～

description.en: An official *Inazuma Eleven* spin-off manga focusing on the casual daily life of Gouenji Shuuya, known as the "Flame Ace Striker" and shows what the cool collected Gouenji is thinking about.

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja: みゆちゃんはずっと友達

altTitles.en: Miyu-chan Will Always Be Your Friend

description.en: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...
description.es: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.ja: 高校2年生の夏、主人公・田原優心の隣の家に、引っ越しで別れてしまった幼馴染・深川みゆちゃんが帰ってきた。すっかり大きく可愛くなったみゆちゃんだけど、どこかちょっとヘンで…？
description.zh: 在高二夏天，主人公·田原优心与小学毕业时因搬家被迫分别的青梅竹马·深川美羽重逢了。虽然长大后的美羽变得很可爱，但是哪里有点奇怪……？过于温柔的主人公，与惹人喜爱却处处充满疑点的青梅竹马之间展开的新颖青春恋爱悬疑喜剧！
description.es-la: En el verano de su segundo año de instituto, su amiga de la infancia Miyu Fukagawa vuelve a la casa de al lado del protagonista, Yuushin Tahara, después de haberse separado cuando se mudó. Miyu-chan ha crecido y se ha vuelto mucho más guapa, pero hay algo un poco extraño en ella...? Se trata de una comedia de suspenso y amor con una nueva sensación, en la que el demasiado amable protagonista y su simpática pero muy divertida amiga de la infancia ¡se desenvuelven con sus amigos!
description.pt-br:
No verão do seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Tahara Yuushin descobre que sua amiga de infância, Fukagawa Miyu, que havia se mudado, retornou para a casa ao lado. Embora Miyu tenha se tornado uma garota bastante fofa, há algo um pouco estranho sobre ela...

Uma comédia romântica com toques de suspense, centrada em um protagonista gentil e sua amiga de infância adorável, porém um tanto excêntrica.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: I Killed the Player of the Academy

altTitles.es-la: Yo maté al jugador de la Academia

description.en:
One day, I was reincarnated the world of a game of Heroic Legend of Arhan as Corin Loch, a minor NPC, and joined hands with the game's protagonist, Park Si-ho, to save the world. 

However, as the story shifted, I accidentally found out his true nature - a murderous pervert who only wanted to accumulate experience points by hook or by crook! In order to save world peace, I killed him... and became the main character instead of him! 

What should I do in the future to bring the game to a perfect ending?
description.ko:
플레이어를 죽였다.
죽일 만한 놈이었다. 아주 X새끼였거든.

description.en:
Seo MoonYeob was the world’s greatest superhuman, who sacrificed himself after saving humanity.

Thought to have been dead, he returns 17 years later to a now-peaceful world,
and the superhuman sport faces seismic change.

The story of a modern-fantasy sports-action starts now!
description.ko:
인류를 구하고 홀로 희생한 영웅, 최강의 초인 서문엽.
죽었다고 알려진 그가 17년 후의 평화로운 세상에 돌연 귀환하면서
초인들의 스포츠 <배틀필드>에는 지각변동이 일어나기 시작한다.

본격 현대 판타지 X 스포츠 X 액션!

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

description.en:
Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

altTitles.ja: たゆたう煙は掴めない

description.en: Chiaki, a college student without a girlfriend, meets Miyako, a waitress at a shisha store, through a matching app recommended by a friend. This is a love story that lyrically depicts a faint love that begins with a matching app and shisha.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで知り合ったのはシーシャが似合うヒト。

彼女いない歴＝年齢の平凡な大学生・千秋が軽い気持ちで始めたマッチングアプリ。そこで知り合ったのはシーシャカフェで働く少し年上の都。初めてのシーシャ体験に戸惑いつつも徐々にのめり込み、ミステリアスな彼女にも次第に惹かれていくも都は文字通り掴みどころがなく…。
description.pt-br: Chiaki, um estudante universitário sem namorada, conhece Miyako, uma garçonete de uma casa de shisha, através de um aplicativo de relacionamento recomendado por um amigo. Esta é uma história de amor que retrata poeticamente um sentimento inicial e delicado, nascido em um aplicativo de celular e embalado pelo aroma do shisha.

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

altTitles.ja: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス

description.en:
The greatest labyrinth of the 20th century, a drama for working men and women in a town called Kowloon Walled City. A daily adult romance in a gentle dystopia.  
  
(…can a dystopia be gentle?)
description.ja: 此処は東洋の魔窟、九龍城砦。ノスタルジー溢れる人々が暮らし、街並みに過去・現在・未来が交差するディストピア。はたらく30代の男女の非日常で贈る日常と密かな想いと関係性をあざやかに描き出す理想的なラヴロマンスを貴方に――。
description.pt-br: O maior labirinto do século 20, um drama para homens e mulheres trabalhadores de uma cidade murada chamada Kowloon. Um romance adulto diário em uma distopia suave, uma nova vida tranquila.

title.en: Melty Blood - Back Alley Alliance Nightmare

altTitles.ja: MELTY BLOOD 路地裏ナイトメア

description.en:
The Official Melty/Tsukihime/Fate Grand Order Crossover Manga  
  
Melty Blood: Rojiura Nightmare is a spin-off and sequel to the Melty Blood fighting games and manga, as well as the Fate/Grand Order mobile game.

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Ossan Healer and the Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-Aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.
